classification: Photographs; Collages / Assemblages; Works on Paper
creditline: Gift of funds from Nancy and Rolf Engh
description: collage with photographic element; multicolored world map in background; black and white photograph in foreground of a young woman wearing Native American dress, seated on a couch covered in Native American woven blanket, surrounded by quillwork and beadwork items; photocopy of a photographic image of a Native American man with long hair wearing feathers in his hair in ULQ, with a photocopy of an image of a white woman's face with reddened lips, and an image of a Native American woman wearing large round earrings; photocopy of image of two standing woman and a standing man in ULQ; received unglazed in black metal frame
signed: LRC on inner mat in pencil: hulleah Tsinhnahjinnie \'90
title: When Did Dreams of White Buffalo Turn into Dreams of White Women?
